title: Out with a Bang
overview: Professional esports player Xiao Yi Chuan will soon retire from the sport. In order to rise to the highest step of the podium, he refused to treat injuries, and upon returning home he met a hot-tempered girl Xiong Qiu Qiu, who is going to recruit players for her team. After the girl's tireless efforts, Xiao Yi Chuan decided to join this team. When the team was formed, the game individualist Xiao And Chuan, the king of theories Hong Yang, full of potential Chu Tian and Dong Shi, who joined the team at their own expense, not only face strong rivals, but also the problems of team members, ranging from beginners in games to game masters.
